description: View details of a managed job template.

parameters.name: templateName
parameters.description: The unique name of a managed job template, which is required.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The unique name of a managed template, such as AWS-Reboot.

nested_items.name: templateArn
nested_items.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the managed template.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The unique description of a managed template.

nested_items.name: templateVersion
nested_items.description: The version for a managed template.

nested_items.name: environments
nested_items.description: A list of environments that are supported with the managed job template.

nested_items.name: documentParameters
nested_items.description: A map of key-value pairs that you can use as guidance to specify the inputs for creating a job from a managed template.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: Key of the map field containing the patterns that need to be replaced in a managed template job document schema.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: Description of the map field containing the patterns that need to be replaced in a managed template job document schema.

nested_items.name: regex
nested_items.description: A regular expression of the patterns that need to be replaced in a managed template job document schema.

nested_items.name: example
nested_items.description: An example illustrating a pattern that need to be replaced in a managed template job document schema.

nested_items.name: optional
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a pattern that needs to be replaced in a managed template job document schema is optional or required.

nested_items.name: document
nested_items.description: The document schema for a managed job template.
